pages.text: Exploration is really powerful in this pack, you will find incredible loot that will help you progress through the pack, though not strictly required for progression.$(br2)Each lootable chest is able to be opened, and generated by every player, which means that even already explored area can give you great hauls.

A very unique aspect of this pack is that the loot actually changes as you progress. The further you are in the pack, the better the loot be, in such a way that you don't feel overpowered early on, but at the same time not bored near the end. Remember to explore at each stage of the game!
